Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Vase without a neck, with a restricted mouth and flat lip.  The clay is coarse but heterogeneous, with an organic temper, well fired and red-brown. Two small, almost horizontal lines are noticeable, incised on the shoulder after firing.
